name: Don't stop, Can't stop
description:
You suddenly wake up in a strange room with a circular hoverboard, the sign says "Don't Touch!" but we all know what will happen...

This is a prototype platforming/speedrunning game made for the Quarantine Game Jam in which the main mechanic (spoiler: not implemented yet due to time :c ) is going faster than a threshold (A LOT of SPEED) to prevent the hoverboard from heating up and exploding (and killing you in the process).

The controls are airy/icey, just like a very fast hoverboard would control and to add rewarding difficulty. I didn't manage to add audio in the process but I will continue it eventually as the hard controls and physics are fun (even if buggy)

CONTROLS:

  • Arrow Keys/WASD to move
  • Spacebar to Jump
  • Alt+F4 to Quit

Tips: Don't jump on upwards slopes as, for some reason, you slow down instead of going faster (I guess the hoverboard is malfunctioning). Also feel free to try skipping and speedrunning the level!
